transcripts.text: My fellow Americans, tonight I want to speak with you about our nation's unprecedented response to the coronavirus outbreak that started in China and is now spreading throughout the world.  We have it totally under control.  It's one person coming in from China.  It's going to disappear one day.  It's like a miracle.  It will disappear.  Now the Democrats are politicizing, and this is their new hoax.  If you're healthy, you will probably go through a process and you'll be fine.  Be calm.  It's really working out.  A lot of good things are going to happen.
Dr.  Fauci said earlier this week that the lag in testing was in fact a failing.  Do you take responsibility for that?
No, I don't take responsibility at all.
But you did disband the White House pandemic office.  So what responsibility do you take to that?
Well, I just think it's a nasty question.
And on a scale of 1 to 10, how would you rate your response to this crisis?
I'd rate it a 10.  I think we've done a great job.

What do you say to Americans who are scared, though?  I guess nearly 200 dead, 14,000 who are sick, millions, as you witnessed, who are scared right now.  What do you say to Americans who are watching you right now who are scared?

I say that you're a terrible reporter.  That's what I say.  It's a very inaccurate way.  It's so insulting when they write phony stories that they know are fake news.  But remember, we inherited a broken, obsolete system.

Well, God damn.  Look, it's all accurate.  And obviously, I am no fan of Biden.  I mean, he wasn't even in that ad because he can't really Speak weirdly.  But yeah, I mean, that was a great ad by his team.  And it's quite similar to another ad that went viral, I believe, last week by Priorities USA.  And they are running it in Michigan, Wisconsin, Florida, and Pennsylvania, obviously battleground states that the Democrats are going to need if they want a chance of defeating Trump in November.

the coronavirus.  This is their new hoax.  We have it totally under control.  It's one person coming in from China.  One day it's like a miracle, it will disappear.  When you have 15 people and within a couple of days it's going to be down to close to zero, we really think we've done a great job in keeping it down to a minimum.  I like this stuff.  I really get it.  People are surprised that I understand it.  No, I don't take responsibility at all.  Priorities USA Action is responsible for the content of this ad.

Yeah, Trump is so terrified of that ad that his lawyers are trying to make sure that it doesn't air in those states.  This is according to The Guardian.  Trump's lawyers have now sent a cease and desist letter to television broadcast stations across the country to stop airing the ad created by Priorities USA, a Democratic super PAC.  They're claiming the hoax part is being taken out of context.  Ah, you know, Trump would maybe have a leg to stand on if he didn't run horrifically misleading ads all the time before this.  So the hypocrisy is really stunning and it's nice to see the Democrats kind of give him a taste of his own medicine in that regard.  So I'm happy to see that those ads are extraordinarily effective.  And when you have Gallup reporting that Trump's approval rating for his coronavirus response is around 60% and numerous polls showing that he has matched his top approval rating.  He's, you know, now above water, meaning more Americans in many polls approve of him than disapprove of his performance as president, which is mind-blowing.  But when you have that kind of shift because the country's in a crisis, you need ads like that to call him out.  And so I'm happy to see these ads and look, good job Biden team.  Perhaps you might want to put your candidate in one of these ads that are more effective because, uh, I don't know if you know this, but he'll have to face off against Trump on the debate stage.  And it won't be a team of digital strategists behind him when they're face to face one-on-one.
